Articles.Content:
It is simple. Have an animal in the general vacinity? Take a pic and put it here!

![MspkV2n.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/MspkV2n.jpg)

Name is optional, but her name is Boots. 12 years old. Named so for her white tipped paws that look like she forgot to wear boots in Michigan during January. That stuff is like 2 feet man.

My kitty cat, Named Petronius the arbiter.

![B5ZEJrb.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/B5ZEJrb.jpg)

He's about 3 years old, he went on a 4 month hiatus to god knows where last year and made me very upset.

bo or beau (we argue over the spelling) hes currently 11. hes a cuddle bunny. see that belly, he will let you rub it and wont even try to bite your hand off. 

[![IMG_0085.jpg](http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc103/Emperor_of_Nihil/IMG_0085.jpg)](http://s213.photobucket.com/user/Emperor_of_Nihil/media/IMG_0085.jpg.html)

this is moms cat angel, she has had a series of strokes and now goes by zombie kitty. shes now mostly blind and has trouble getting around and eating hard food. shes 14ish. 

[![IMG_0234_zpsc6d0a213.jpg](http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc103/Emperor_of_Nihil/IMG_0234_zpsc6d0a213.jpg)](http://s213.photobucket.com/user/Emperor_of_Nihil/media/IMG_0234_zpsc6d0a213.jpg.html)

and this is lizzy, i got her as an xmas presant from my sister about a year ago, she is a total brat. shes a klepto kitty, she will steal anything she gets her claws into and is even known to pirate beverages when you are not looking. she is a very destructive force in our house, peeling paint everywhere she can find a small hole to get started she is also known to gnaw through wires in one chomp. she has all kinds of wierd quirks (for example she has a thing for ice cubes but hates snow) that make her adorable. her and bo are partners in crime.

[![a57b86b3-5f17-448c-866d-f2b6206fcb4d_zps5acdda69.jpg](http://i213.photobucket.com/albums/cc103/Emperor_of_Nihil/a57b86b3-5f17-448c-866d-f2b6206fcb4d_zps5acdda69.jpg)](http://s213.photobucket.com/user/Emperor_of_Nihil/media/a57b86b3-5f17-448c-866d-f2b6206fcb4d_zps5acdda69.jpg.html)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-28T07:55:42Z" title="02/28/2015 07:55  AM" data-short="9 yr">February 28, 2015</time> by Nuke**
Cat photos? What is this? The Internet? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
![puppygirl.jpg](http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o222/tatersw/Misc/puppygirl.jpg)

A few years ago I went to take a picture of my dog, but he refused to do anything but lay on his back. I turned the camera upside-down and took a picture.

After posting the picture online, someone apparently liked it an added some text and stuff.

Sadly I can't find the original, so this version will have to do:

![FsEv3y2.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/FsEv3y2.jpg)

His name is Joey ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Do pet peeves count? I have a whole zoo of those ![:rolleyes:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_rolleyes.gif)

> 
> Cat photos? What is this? The Internet? ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

The internet, the pet store, what's the difference?

![rock.png](http://s15.postimg.org/j0k589auj/rock.png)

His name is Rock.

> 
> His name is Rock.

Nice leash! But I am surprised that he needs a leash? Does he run away often?

> 
> His name is Rock.

I'd imagine that litter box training is not an issue. ![:confused:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_huh.gif)

![trinny.jpg](http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o222/tatersw/Misc/trinny.jpg)

My pet rock, Trinny. He's pretty young for a rock, he was born July 16, 1945 at 05:29:21 am.

![ezimba11596860898200.jpg](http://www.ezimba.com/work/150302C/ezimba11596860898200.jpg)

His name is Twinkie Pie - but its a misnomer, he is the biggest, manliest alpha cat ever! Seen here at one of my dad's Dungeons and Dragons sessions. With dice on his paws, even though he almost never lets anybody touch them, or else he'll bite your face!

> 
> [http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o222/tatersw/Misc/trinny.jpg](http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o222/tatersw/Misc/trinny.jpg)
> My pet rock, Trinny. He's pretty young for a rock, he was born July 16, 1945 at 05:29:21 am.

Thank you, google. ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

That's Robby. He passed away on December 26th 2014 at the age of 18.

![EHVTtRz.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/EHVTtRz.jpg)

no joke or just a half to Bounty hunt.

Cats are overrated. That's my girl:

![FIltJlt.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/FIltJlt.jpg)

> 
> Nice leash! But I am surprised that he needs a leash? Does he run away often?

He's been awfully quiet and still lately. I might have to take him to a vet. I suppose that's ok for his age.

> 
> [http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o222/tatersw/Misc/trinny.jpg](http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o222/tatersw/Misc/trinny.jpg)
> My pet rock, Trinny. He's pretty young for a rock, he was born July 16, 1945 at 05:29:21 am.

He's so cool he's glowing.
I have a pet named Gimpy, but I'd probably get banned for posting pictures......

They scraped the top 2 meters off the fenced in area where they let people go when the site is open to the public and buried elsewhere on base. They didn't do a great job. A guy I know who worked at the missile range went out and collected a sheet of it that was nearly as big as a dinner plate.

Mein Katze

![ObRJbxJ.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/ObRJbxJ.jpg)

Twinkle Toes (AKA Princess Fishmittens) Double polydactyl on every paw, that's 8 extra toes:

![mSZeanh.png](http://i.imgur.com/mSZeanh.png)

Bonnie; one of my sugar gliders (RIP):

![7Q7AhD5.png](http://i.imgur.com/7Q7AhD5.png)

Mustapha (Goliath bird eater, RIP):

![sLyP4t4.png](http://i.imgur.com/sLyP4t4.png)

Precious (Royal Python):

![FIFbMKB.png](http://i.imgur.com/FIFbMKB.png)

And Mr Tegu himself (Old pic, He's HUGE now):

![VSZSQiN.png](http://i.imgur.com/VSZSQiN.png)

I have more but those are/were my favorites.

Mein doge, Izzie (well, family pet, technically).

> 
> This is her now:
> 
> [![qq4Cc42.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/qq4Cc42.jpg)](http://imgur.com/qq4Cc42)
> 
> Around a year ago:
> 
> [![KmTVLS9.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/KmTVLS9.jpg)](http://imgur.com/KmTVLS9)
> 
> And on the first day we had her:
> 
> [![zL6fDoF.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/zL6fDoF.jpg)](http://imgur.com/zL6fDoF)
> 
> We got her from the RSPCA. There was a litter of 7 or 8 puppies, all boxers (imagine the energy levels...), and the original owner couldn't keep 'em as he was quite old, I believe. So, on the first day back from the RSPCA, I naturally went for the camera.
> 
> She'll be turning two around May 25^th^.
